content: >our crescent shaped creole bag is crocheted in trilogy with a suede-wrapped handle berroco 14 wide x 12 high not including handle berroco trilogy 80yrds/73m 1 75oz/50g 7619 braemar brown - 6 hanks 480 yards optional berroco suede 120yrds/110m 1 75oz/50g 3716 maverick - 1 ball note we used suede to wrap around handle only crochet hook size 4 50 mm g gauge 14 double_crochet x 10 row = 4 with trilogy yarn one 1¾ button one 13 long rattan and wood handle with ring at each end
